name: Experiment_B297-O [Experimental]
description:
You wake up in a strange place it seems like some kind of laboratory but something weird is going on here...

Will you be able to survive in such a hostile environment? And solve the "puzzles"?

Or will you die in pain?

Credits

Yanfly, Nilo K., YouFulca

I released version 0.2.0
This is what i changed:
Bug fix
Polishing the game
Correct untranslated elements
More gameplay
Addition of the 1st boss

Additional info

This smal game (V0.1.0) was made one day, all textures were done by me.

Known issue
It is possible that there is some  broken english somewhere
